attributes.action: Thresa may is to let MPs have a vote on brexit before article 50 is triggered
attributes.additional_details:
Following sources online these articles will give you a better idea

http://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/politics/theresa-may-accused-of-acting-like-a-tudor-monarch-over-plans-to-deny-parliament-brexit-vote-a7213361.html


http://www.theguardian.com/politics/2016/aug/27/theresa-may-acting-like-tudor-monarch-in-denying-mps-a-vote-over-brexit
attributes.background:
Thresa may the prime minster of the U.K. Is planning on blocking the vote of the MPs on brexit which would mean that no fair vote would be held.
The majority of the MPs wish to vote to stay within the Eu rather then leave.

rejection.details: The open petition similar to yours is https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
